thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com
thread.title: Janet and Roy Swartz
thread.title_full: DogVacay reviewed by Janet and Roy Swartz

author: Janet and Roy Swartz
title: Janet and Roy Swartz
text: We are so grateful to DogVacay for linking us with our Cocker Spaniel's new "baby-sitter"! With Gracey B.we are secure in the knowledge that our Candy is well taken care of as well as loved. She was immediately taken into their home and hearts. Gracey was also the perfect choice for administering Candy's allergy medications. Great having a nurse and a loving family watch over your precious four legged family member...the many photos sent to us by Gracey show how happy Candy is with them.
